entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aupaluk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:07 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aupaluk Airport 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -33.1°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -37.4°C
Wind: W 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
